Problem & Target Users

The Problem

Need a lightweight, local-only task management tool that's polished enough for quick demos while remaining simple to implement.

Existing tools are either too complex for demos or too basic to showcase modern UI patterns.

No backend required - purely client-side with data portability.

Target Users

Primary Audience

  • Personal use (single user)
  • Demo/presentation scenarios
  • Quick prototyping showcase
  • Developers learning React patterns

Use Cases

  • Live coding demos
  • UI/UX pattern showcase
  • Personal task tracking
  • Portfolio project
